com.zerocool.scene
Class PlayerObject

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.scene.SceneElement
      com.jme.scene.Spatial
          com.jme.scene.Node
              com.zerocool.scene.GameObject
                  com.zerocool.scene.DynamicGameObject
                      com.zerocool.scene.PlayerObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, java.io.Serializable
public class PlayerObject
extends DynamicGameObject

PlayerObject extends DynamicGameObject. PlayerObject manages the objects controlled by the players.

Version:
PlayerObject.java,v 0.1 2006/10/03
Author:
Chris Gibson
See Also:
Serialized Form

PlayerObject

public PlayerObject(int player_ID,
                    org.keplerproject.luajava.LuaState l)
public PlayerObject initializes the player object and sets the player's id. The ID numbers 0 to 32 are reserved for players.
